Amenable.definition: legally subject or answerable [the corporation is not to suit in New York] 2 a
Amenable.origin: [the corporation is not to suit in New York]

1.definition: legally subject or answerable [the corporation is not to suit in New York]

2 a.definition: suited by nature [an adult is not to a juvenile treatment program]

sub_terms.b: readily yielding, submitting, or cooperating [defendant is to rehabilitation ""]
